channel.title: What are your favourite Artists/Bands?
channel.description:
Just out of curiosity. Myself, I listen to a lot of Heavy Metal, majority of it being Melodic Death Metal; In Flames, At The Gates, Amon Amarth, Children Of Bodom, Dark Tranquillity, As I lay Dying etc.
So what do you guys listen to?

item.title: What are your favourite Artists/Bands?
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

Metallica, Iron Maiden, Phenomena, The Script, Micheal Jackson, Avenged Sevenfold, Some Justin Timberlake, Some rap mainly Eminem, Drowning Pool, Nirvana, ACDC, Dire Straits, Bon Jovi, Chris de Burgh, Alphaville, Scorpions, Sting, The Beatles

My favourites, although I have some more, I don’t usually listen to anything other than those.

also, nice 1 year gravedig.

Read full topic

item.title: What are your favourite Artists/Bands?
item.dc:creator: @R_A_R_E_S R A R E S
item.description:
@R_A_R_E_S wrote:

Uggggg!
Here i go

Coheed and cambria
Annotation for an autopsy
Avenged sevenfold
Attack attack
Bring me the horizon
Breaking benjamin
Black veil brides
Death klock
Bullet for my valentine
Tenacious D
Janus
Ozzy
Drop dead gorgeous
In fear and faith
Worth the wait
HIM
Eminem
Lil wayne
Slayer
Hawthorn heights
Pendulum
Suicide silence
Horse the band
Atreyu
Funeral for a friend
Pink floyd
Incubus

That is really all i can think of atm.

item.title: What are your favourite Artists/Bands?
item.dc:creator: @I_Yaa_I I Yaa I
item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

[quote=“T3arful, post:66, topic:319252”][quote author=I Yaa I link=topic=415725.msg3069721#msg3069721 date=1261446791]

Nobody fucking said Niggers have to be black. I fucking know they do rap you dumbass. Eminem raps, not a poet, just because he fucking raps you dumbass. If you don’t fucking know anything then don’t post you ignorant fool.

I’m an ignorant dumb ass? Yet you’re the one that’s a believer of God, where if you don’t know the answer God must have done it. And you’re too ignorant to interpret a joke. What does that say about you?

And a nigger is a black person you idiot

The word originated as a term used in a neutral context to refer to black people, as a variation of the Spanish/Portuguese noun negro, a descendant of the Latin adjective niger, meaning “black”.

Wikipedia isn’t always right. God is real because who created everything? But God had no beginning! He has always existed - and He always will. God isn’t like anything - or anyone else - in the whole universe. God is greater than the universe - far greater than anything we can ever imagine. You are just a dumbass athiest.

[/quote]
I used Wikipedia as a quick answer. Do some research, they will all say the same thing.
And for your stupid ‘God did ____’ remarks, go onto the Creation Vs Evolution thread, that is what reaction you will get.

I don’t wish to further continue this argument with you, because it is degrading on myself.[/quote]

You know i’m right.

Read full topic
